thag2.24:0.4_0: this is what belongs to the same Buddhist sect.
thag2.24:1.1_0: The duty of one whose energy is strong;
thag2.24:1.2_0: the duty of one who longs to wake up:
thag2.24:1.3_0: that I’ll do, I won’t fail—
thag2.24:2.2_0: the direct route that culminates in the deathless.
thag2.24:2.4_0: as the Ganges knows the ocean.
